title: LF ADC (D5+) - Smurfing
body:
Hi,

Smurfing Support (Season Ended P2 75 LP decayed from D5 0LP :> forgot about the Account)
Main peaked D2.

Can Join Discord/Ts3
Either English or German language.

Would pref. Lulu/Janna/Karma+Hyper Carry
Also like playing Tanks in certain Matchups - Braum/Tahm etc.

You should have ended the Season at least D5 or also Smurfing

Give me a Add will be Online tomorrow around 18:00

Zemljovina997

zu faul zum übersetzen :^) selber Post im EN Forum :v
